title: Articles agreed upon by the arch-bishops and bishops of both provinces, and the whole clergie in the convocation holden at London, in the yeer 1562. For the avoiding of diversities of opinions, and for the stablishing of consent touching true religion. Re-printed by his Majesties commandment: with his royall declaration prefixed thereunto.
author: Church of England.
publicationStmtPublisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,
